clusters.title: Europe feels the impact of weeks of wet weather and freezing cold
clusters.neutral_headline: Europe feels the impact of weeks of wet weather and freezing cold

items.title: Europe feels the impact of weeks of wet weather and freezing cold
items.standfirst: A blocked weather pattern has been bringing persistent heavy rain to the Iberian Peninsula. As Darren Bett explains, that's not the only type of extreme weather affecting Europe at the moment.
items.content: A blocked weather pattern has been bringing persistent heavy rain to the Iberian Peninsula. As Darren Bett explains, that's not the only type of extreme weather affecting Europe at the moment.

clusters.title: I was full of shame after being sacked for having endometriosis
clusters.neutral_headline: I was full of shame after being sacked for having endometriosis

items.title: I was full of shame after being sacked for having endometriosis
items.standfirst: Sanju Pal wins an employment appeal tribunal that could affect how employers can treat staff with endometriosis.
items.content: Sanju Pal wins an employment appeal tribunal that could affect how employers can treat staff with endometriosis.

clusters.neutral_headline: Intrusive thoughts? John has a room for that

items.title: Intrusive thoughts? John has a room for that
items.standfirst: John tells Elis and Dave about his mind's "resentment room".
items.content: John tells Elis and Dave about his mind's "resentment room".

clusters.title: Court upholds return of surgeon who harassed staff
clusters.neutral_headline: Court upholds return of surgeon who harassed staff

items.title: Court upholds return of surgeon who harassed staff
items.standfirst: James Gilbert, who was based in Oxford, was previously suspended for sexual harassment.
items.content: James Gilbert, who was based in Oxford, was previously suspended for sexual harassment.

clusters.title: More baby formula products recalled over toxin fears
clusters.neutral_headline: More baby formula products recalled over toxin fears

items.title: More baby formula products recalled over toxin fears
items.standfirst: Danone has recalled 15 more batches of Aptamil and Cow&Gate first infant milk because a toxin called cereulide may be present.
items.content: Danone has recalled 15 more batches of Aptamil and Cow&Gate first infant milk because a toxin called cereulide may be present.
